00138                                       boost::vecS,                                  /* vertices in std::vector */
00139                                       boost::bidirectionalS,

00162         public:
00163             virtual ~EdgeFilter() {}

00174         void set_vertex_filter(VertexFilter *filter) { vertex_filter = filter; }
00175         VertexFilter *get_vertex_filter() const { return vertex_filter; }
00184         void set_edge_filter(EdgeFilter *filter) { edge_filter = filter; }
00185         EdgeFilter *get_edge_filter() const { return edge_filter; }
00193         bool is_vertex_filtered(SgAsmBlock *block, VertexFilter *filter) { return filter && !(*filter)(this, block); }
00194         bool is_vertex_filtered(SgAsmBlock *block) { return is_vertex_filtered(block, vertex_filter); }
00202         bool is_edge_filtered(SgAsmBlock *src, SgAsmBlock *dst, EdgeFilter *filter) {
00203             return filter && !(*filter)(this, src, dst);
00204         }
00205         bool is_edge_filtered(SgAsmBlock *src, SgAsmBlock *dst) {
00206             return is_edge_filtered(src, dst, edge_filter);
00207         }

00323     private:
00324         /* Visitor used by flow_order().  Declaring this in function scope results in boost errors (boost-1.42, 2011-05). */
00325         template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00326         struct FlowOrder: public boost::default_dfs_visitor {
00327             typedef typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor Vertex;
00328             typedef std::vector<Vertex> VertexList;
00329             typedef std::vector<size_t> ReverseVertexList;
00330             VertexList *forward_order;
00331             FlowOrder(VertexList *forward_order): forward_order(forward_order) {}
00332             void compute(const ControlFlowGraph &g, Vertex v0, ReverseVertexList *reverse_order);
00333             void finish_vertex(Vertex v, ControlFlowGraph g);
00334         };
00335             
00336         /* Helper class for build_cfg_from_ast().  Adds vertices to its 'cfg' member. Vertices are any SgAsmBlock that contains
00337          * at least one SgAsmInstruction. */
00338         template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00339         class VertexInserter: public AstSimpleProcessing {
00340         public:
00341             ControlFlow *analyzer;
00342             ControlFlowGraph &cfg;
00343             typedef typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor Vertex;
00344             typedef std::map<SgAsmBlock*, Vertex> BlockVertexMap;
00345             BlockVertexMap &bv_map;
00346             VertexInserter(ControlFlow *analyzer, ControlFlowGraph &cfg, BlockVertexMap &bv_map)
00347                 : analyzer(analyzer), cfg(cfg), bv_map(bv_map)
00348                 {}
00349             // Add basic block to graph if it hasn't been added already.
00350             void conditionally_add_vertex(SgAsmBlock *block) {
00351                 if (block && block->has_instructions() && !analyzer->is_vertex_filtered(block) &&
00352                     bv_map.find(block)==bv_map.end()) {
00353                     Vertex vertex = add_vertex(cfg);
00354                     bv_map[block] = vertex;
00355                     put(boost::vertex_name, cfg, vertex, block);
00356                 }
00357             }
00358             void visit(SgNode *node) {
00359                 if (isSgAsmFunction(node)) {
00360                     // Add the function entry block before the other blocks of the function.  This ensures that the entry block
00361                     // of a function has a lower vertex number than the other blocks of the function (the traversal is not
00362                     // guaranteed to visit the function basic blocks in that order).
00363                     conditionally_add_vertex(isSgAsmFunction(node)->get_entry_block());
00364                 } else {
00365                     conditionally_add_vertex(isSgAsmBlock(node));
00366                 }
00367             }
00368         };
00369 
00370     public:
00403         template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00404         std::vector<typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor>
00405         flow_order(const ControlFlowGraph&,
00406                    typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor start,
00407                    std::vector<size_t> *reverse_order=NULL);
00408 
00409     private:
00410         /* Visitor used by return_blocks(). Declaring this in function scope results in boost errors (boost-1.42, 2011-05). */
00411         template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00412         struct ReturnBlocks: public boost::default_dfs_visitor {
00413             typedef typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor Vertex;
00414             typedef std::vector<Vertex> Vector;
00415             Vector &blocks;
00416             ReturnBlocks(Vector &blocks): blocks(blocks) {}
00417             void finish_vertex(Vertex v, ControlFlowGraph g);
00418         };
00419 
00420     public:
00426         template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00427         std::vector<typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor>
00428         return_blocks(const ControlFlowGraph &cfg,
00429                       typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor start);
00430     };
00431 }

00441 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00442 void
00443 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::apply_to_ast(const ControlFlowGraph &cfg)
00444 {
00445     typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_iterator vi, vi_end;
00446     for (boost::tie(vi, vi_end)=vertices(cfg); vi!=vi_end; ++vi) {
00447         SgAsmBlock *block = get(boost::vertex_name, cfg, *vi);
00448         if (!block || is_vertex_filtered(block))
00449             continue;
00450 
00451         /* Delete old targets */
00452         const SgAsmIntegerValuePtrList &targets = block->get_successors();
00453         for (SgAsmIntegerValuePtrList::const_iterator ti=targets.begin(); ti!=targets.end(); ++ti)
00454             delete *ti;
00455 
00456         /* Add new targets */
00457         block->set_successors_complete(true);
00458         block->get_successors().clear();
00459         typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::out_edge_iterator ei, ei_end;
00460         for (boost::tie(ei, ei_end)=out_edges(*vi, cfg); ei!=ei_end; ++ei) {
00461             SgAsmBlock *target_block = get(boost::vertex_name, cfg, target(*ei, cfg));
00462             if (target_block && !is_edge_filtered(block, target_block)) {
00463                 SgAsmIntegerValueExpression *target = new SgAsmIntegerValueExpression(target_block->get_address());
00464                 target->make_relative_to(target_block);
00465                 target->set_parent(block);
00466                 block->get_successors().push_back(target);
00467             }
00468         }
00469     }
00470 }
00471 
00472 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00473 void
00474 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::cache_vertex_descriptors(const ControlFlowGraph &cfg)
00475 {
00476     typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_iterator vi, vi_end;
00477     for (boost::tie(vi, vi_end)=vertices(cfg); vi!=vi_end; ++vi) {
00478         SgAsmBlock *block = get(boost::vertex_name, cfg, *vi);
00479         if (block && !is_vertex_filtered(block))
00480             block->set_cached_vertex(*vi);
00481     }
00482 }
00483 
00484 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00485 void
00486 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::build_cfg_from_ast(SgNode *root, ControlFlowGraph &cfg)
00487 {
00488     typedef typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor Vertex;
00489     typedef std::map<SgAsmBlock*, Vertex> BlockVertexMap;
00490     BlockVertexMap bv_map;
00491 
00492     cfg.clear();
00493     VertexInserter<ControlFlowGraph>(this, cfg, bv_map).traverse(root, preorder);
00494 
00495     /* Add the edges. */
00496     typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_iterator vi, vi_end;
00497     for (boost::tie(vi, vi_end)=vertices(cfg); vi!=vi_end; ++vi) {
00498         SgAsmBlock *source = boost::get(boost::vertex_name, cfg, *vi);
00499         const SgAsmIntegerValuePtrList &succs = source->get_successors();
00500         for (SgAsmIntegerValuePtrList::const_iterator si=succs.begin(); si!=succs.end(); ++si) {
00501             SgAsmBlock *target = isSgAsmBlock((*si)->get_base_node()); // might be null
00502             if (target && !is_edge_filtered(source, target)) {
00503                 typename BlockVertexMap::iterator bvmi=bv_map.find(target);
00504                 if (bvmi!=bv_map.end())
00505                     add_edge(*vi, bvmi->second, cfg);
00506             }
00507         }
00508     }
00509 }
00510 
00511 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00512 void
00513 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::build_cg_from_ast(SgNode *root, ControlFlowGraph &cfg/*out*/)
00514 {
00515     struct T1: public EdgeFilter {
00516         EdgeFilter *parent;
00517         T1(EdgeFilter *parent): parent(parent) {}
00518         bool operator()(ControlFlow *analyzer, SgAsmBlock *src, SgAsmBlock *dst) {
00519             SgAsmFunction *func = dst ? dst->get_enclosing_function() : NULL;
00520             if (!func || dst!=func->get_entry_block())
00521                 return false;
00522             if (parent)
00523                 return (*parent)(analyzer, src, dst);
00524             return true;
00525         }
00526     };
00527 
00528     EdgeFilter *parent = get_edge_filter();
00529     T1 edge_filter(parent);
00530     try {
00531         set_edge_filter(&edge_filter);
00532         build_cfg_from_ast(root, cfg);
00533     } catch (...) {
00534         set_edge_filter(parent);
00535         throw;
00536     }
00537     set_edge_filter(parent);
00538 }
00539 
00540 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00541 void
00542 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::copy(const ControlFlowGraph &src, ControlFlowGraph &dst/*out*/)
00543 {
00544     typedef typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor Vertex;
00545     Vertex NO_VERTEX = boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::null_vertex();
00546 
00547     dst.clear();
00548     std::vector<Vertex> src_to_dst(num_vertices(src), NO_VERTEX);
00549 
00550     typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_iterator vi, vi_end;
00551     for (boost::tie(vi, vi_end)=vertices(src); vi!=vi_end; ++vi) {
00552         SgAsmBlock *block = get(boost::vertex_name, src, *vi);
00553         if (!is_vertex_filtered(block)) {
00554             src_to_dst[*vi] = add_vertex(dst);
00555             put(boost::vertex_name, dst, src_to_dst[*vi], block);
00556         }
00557     }
00558 
00559     typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::edge_iterator ei, ei_end;
00560     for (boost::tie(ei, ei_end)=edges(src); ei!=ei_end; ++ei) {
00561         if (NO_VERTEX!=src_to_dst[source(*ei, src)] && NO_VERTEX!=src_to_dst[target(*ei, src)]) {
00562             SgAsmBlock *block1 = get(boost::vertex_name, src, source(*ei, src));
00563             SgAsmBlock *block2 = get(boost::vertex_name, src, target(*ei, src));
00564             if (!is_edge_filtered(block1, block2))
00565                 add_edge(src_to_dst[source(*ei, src)], src_to_dst[target(*ei, src)], dst);
00566         }
00567     }
00568 }

00570 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00571 ControlFlowGraph
00572 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::copy(const ControlFlowGraph &src)
00573 {
00574     ControlFlowGraph dst;
00575     copy(src, dst);
00576     return dst;
00577 }
00578 
00579 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00580 void
00581 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::FlowOrder<ControlFlowGraph>::compute(const ControlFlowGraph &g, Vertex v0,
00582                                                                   ReverseVertexList *reverse_order) {
00583     forward_order->clear();
00584     std::vector<boost::default_color_type> colors(num_vertices(g), boost::white_color);
00585     depth_first_visit(g, v0, *this, &(colors[0]));
00586     assert(!forward_order->empty()); /* it should at least contain v0 */
00587     std::reverse(forward_order->begin(), forward_order->end());
00588     if (reverse_order) {
00589         reverse_order->clear();
00590         reverse_order->resize(num_vertices(g), (size_t)(-1));
00591         for (size_t i=0; i<forward_order->size(); i++)
00592             (*reverse_order)[(*forward_order)[i]] = i;
00593     }
00594 }
00595 
00596 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00597 void
00598 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::FlowOrder<ControlFlowGraph>::finish_vertex(Vertex v, ControlFlowGraph g) {
00599     forward_order->push_back(v);
00600 }
00601 
00602 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00603 std::vector<typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor>
00604 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::flow_order(const ControlFlowGraph &cfg,
00605                                         typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor start,
00606                                         std::vector<size_t> *reverse_order/*=NULL*/)
00607 {
00608     std::vector<typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor> forward_order;
00609     FlowOrder<ControlFlowGraph>(&forward_order).compute(cfg, start, reverse_order);
00610     return forward_order;
00611 }
00612 
00613 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00614 void
00615 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::ReturnBlocks<ControlFlowGraph>::finish_vertex(Vertex v, ControlFlowGraph g)
00616 {
00617     typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::out_edge_iterator ei, ei_end;
00618     boost::tie(ei, ei_end) = out_edges(v, g);
00619     if (ei==ei_end)
00620         blocks.push_back(v);
00621 }
00622     
00623 template<class ControlFlowGraph>
00624 std::vector<typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor>
00625 BinaryAnalysis::ControlFlow::return_blocks(const ControlFlowGraph &cfg,
00626                                            typename boost::graph_traits<ControlFlowGraph>::vertex_descriptor start)
00627 {
00628     typename ReturnBlocks<ControlFlowGraph>::Vector result;
00629     ReturnBlocks<ControlFlowGraph> visitor(result);
00630     std::vector<boost::default_color_type> colors(num_vertices(cfg), boost::white_color);
00631     depth_first_visit(cfg, start, visitor, &(colors[0]));
00632     return result;
00633 }
